bug.author: aosterloh
bug.description: This tutorial *_will how you *_how to run the example script on your own images, and will explain some of the options you have to help control the training process. found at <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/how_tos/image_retraining/index.html>https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/master/how_tos/image_retraining/index.html</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: It looks like the issue has been fixed in the code, probably pending a website update.
Looks like this fix is now live, thanks!
